<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>All Fields</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>false</run_business_rules><run_script>true</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

	// Add your code here
	//メール作成
	if(!("u_requested_for_email" in source)) {
		var name = source.u_requested_for.toLowerCase();
		target.u_requested_for_email = name.replace(" ", ".") + "@example.com";
	}

})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>x_58872_needit_historic_needit_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-26 05:42:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>5a2c4891c38302100515d71d050131ad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Import Historic NeedIt Data</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_5a2c4891c38302100515d71d050131ad</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-28 03:00:09</sys_updated_on><target_table>x_58872_needit_needit</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>
